Chief Executive Officer

Founder and CEO, Tony Fred, is the driving force behind our non-profit organization. He is passionate about creating a sustainable future and is involved in all aspects of the organization, from software development to marketing and customer experience strategies.
Chief Commercial Officer

COO Mich Stark thrives on challenges and brings years of experience as a Commercial Director in the software industry to our team. His expertise has been instrumental in getting us to where we are today, and he is one of the best minds in the business.
Chief Technical Officer
CTO Aline Turner is a passionate leader who mentors our in-house developers and looks after our community of thousands of developers.
Chief Financial Officer
Join us in our mission to protect and preserve the planet's most exceptional wild places.
Welcome to our movement for justice, equality, and dignity; a place where your voice, your values, and your actions come together to create real and lasting change.

Every day, communities around the world face discrimination, exclusion, and silence. But together, we can rewrite that story. Becoming a member of our organization isn’t just a formality; it’s a powerful act of solidarity. It’s choosing to stand with those who have been silenced, to defend the rights that protect us all, and to fight for a future where no one is left behind.

As a member, you become part of a network of committed individuals who believe in justice not as an idea, but as a lived reality; on the ground, in policy, in schools, and on the streets. Your membership helps us advocate with strength, mobilize with courage, and educate with heart.
Join us. Because silence never changed the world; people like you do.

div.p: In a world where injustice often goes unseen or ignored, taking action can feel overwhelming. But real change begins with simple, powerful acts — like adding your name to a cause that matters. By signing our petitions, you're not just supporting an issue; you're standing with communities, amplifying the voices of the unheard, and helping us hold decision-makers accountable.

Each signature we collect is a message: that we demand better, fairer, more compassionate policies and systems. From protecting human rights at borders to defending freedom of expression and ensuring dignity in labor;our petitions are rooted in stories, struggles, and hopes for a more just future.

Your signature is a tool for change. It helps raise awareness, apply public pressure, and push for real reforms. Whether it's stopping child labor, fighting discrimination, or supporting those fleeing violence; you have the power to act.

p.strong: Join the movement. Sign today. Stand for justice, equality, and human dignity — for everyone.
